fullText: Nice Work If You Can Get It is a musical that knows what it wants to be: a frothy, old-fashioned entertainment that showcases great Gershwin songs and provides a vehicle for its stars to charm the audience.
dtliExcerpt: Nice Work If You Can Get It is a musical that knows what it wants to be: a frothy, old-fashioned entertainment that showcases great Gershwin songs and provides a vehicle for its stars to charm the audience.
